name: Electrician Simulator
detailed_description:
Upcoming games from our Publisher

Checkout upcoming games from our Publisher - Ultimate Games S.A.:


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1031120/Bakery_Simulator


About the Game

The Electricity Simulator will let you perform various electrical installations, according to your own creative inventiveness!

  • Take orders for repair or electrical installation.
  • Evaluate the profitability of the order and the cost of its implementation.

Complex store:
  • different types of wires,
  • various switches and sockets (various types, parameters, colors),
  • security, cans, counters, boxes and more!

Do you think you did the job well? Have you checked if there is a short circuit? Are you sure you have installed a waterproof electrical outlet in the bathroom?

If so, call the customer to check if everything has been done in accordance with his guidelines.

Welcome to the world of Electricity!

short_description: Do you think that electricity is safe? In that case, you have not played Electrician Simulator yet! Take orders, assemble sockets and burn fuses!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3,20GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
